text: 13.4: VB 18.18Mba kuruga bakɨme won ŋkasŋkar mba ruaŋruaŋgi sɨga nɨɨŋgim, mba gumgi gu mbigi ne nzuav ana rotu mbuav, vhɨra mba ruaŋruaŋgi sɨga rotu mbui. Mbe mani rotu mbuav khaŋ nzuai, “The kha ruaŋruaŋgi sɨga fara muuŋgi? The ana shogirga tuktɨgi?” Repat, ana farkɨne fara muuŋgi sɨk ma. (13.2) Bear, ana fiaŋ fara muuŋgi sɨk ma. (13.2)
